siteName.title: Site title
siteName.subtitle: Rename site
siteName.description: Change the title of your website after it has been published.

siteLink.title: Your site
siteLink.description: Share this link with your audience.

smartContract.title: Smart contract
smartContract.description: The link to the smart contract which represents your site.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: A small image that represents your brand or app.

customLogo.title: Custom logo
customLogo.description: Your logo shown in the app interface.

headerColor.title: Header color
headerColor.description: Select a new color for the header using the color picker

editHeaderLinks.title: Header
editHeaderLinks.subtitle: Navigation
editHeaderLinks.description: Create a navigation menu by adding links

title.required: Please enter a title for link

link.url: Please enter a valid URL for link

formErrors.minLinks: Please add at least one link

linksColor.title: Links color
linksColor.description: Sets the color of the title links in the header

roleManager.title: Site roles
roleManager.subtitle: Manage site roles
roleManager.description: This page is dedicated to managing user roles within the site. It allows for the assignment and adjustment of roles to ensure proper access control and responsibility distribution across the team.

form.grantRole: Enter the user's Ethereum address to assign a role

attestatorsManager.title: Manage preferred attestors
attestatorsManager.subtitle: Highlight trusted voices across your site
attestatorsManager.description: Select and manage preferred users whose attestations will appear at the top of relevant content and be marked with a checkmark icon. This feature helps surface trusted opinions and enhances credibility for your readers.

ens.title: Connect ENS Domain
ens.subtitle: Link your ENS domain to your ChainWiki site
ens.description: Connect with the wallet that owns your ENS domain to link it to your ChainWiki site. Once configured, visiting your ENS domain will automatically redirect to your ChainWiki site.

domain.invalid: Please enter a valid ENS domain (e.g., myname.eth)

formPlaceholders.name: Enter full name of the site

successCreateNft.title: Site created
successCreateNft.description: Your site is visible on "My sites" page.

indexPages.noPagesInActiveList: Move the pages you want to show here
indexPages.noPagesInHiddenList: Move the pages you want to hide here
